value:
Wow... This sure is a nice place you
got here. What kind o' vegetables
grow in these parts?

I was a farmer before I joined His
Majesticality Chrom's army, so if
you got crops, I'll take care of 'em.

I can do patrols for ya if ya like.
You got other jobs and...I'd like
you to rely on me more.

Wanna go work the fields together?
I kinda planted some crops in the
courtyard. Don't tell, though!

My pa gave me this stone. He said
it had a kinda power hidden away in
it. Been my dream to figure it out.

Hey there! I came over
here to say howdy from
$Nf!
I'm too big for my britches.
I still got a long ways left to go.
Well, shucks! I'll have to try harder!

Feels funny... Like I'm a whole
different fella!

My name's Donnel. Just a farmer
from a little bitty village, but I can
fight—this pot's not just for show!

Well, well! There you are,
$Nu!$k$pI wanted ta give you these fresh
veggies from my garden!$k$pDunno if you've seen the garden—
I planted it in the courtyard... Sorry
if that was wrong o' me...$k$pAw, shucks! Thanks for not bein'
mad. I'll keep on helping the Order
any way I can.$k$pYou're always so nice about stuff—
that's why I like you so much.
Just feels natural, you know?$k$pI'll keep raisin' great vegetables
and getting stronger and stronger...
Just see the fighter I'll be for you!
でぇいっ！
そいやっ！
わわっ！
I dun messed up!
Get ready!
C'mon, Donny...
I'll bury you!
I'm plowing through!
Sorry, Ma...
Heehee
This pot's kept my noggin safe for a good while now. Reckon I'll keep it.
You all eat, right? So where do you grow the crops in this world?
Lot of folks don't think much of villagers, but we put up a fight if we need to.
Shucks... Hair's out of control again.
I ain't so good at studying, but I like learning new things.
Someday, after I've made a man of myself, I'll go back to Ma and the farm...
Try some of my veggies! Ma always said there's no taste like honest work.
Well!
Got it.
Whoa!
